TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CivicAddress extends System.Object

span.span: Represents a civic address.

summary.span: 一个市政地址可以包括街道地址、邮政编码、省/直辖市/自治区和国家/地区等字段。

span.span: A civic address can include fields such as street address, postal code, state/province, and country or region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用实现的类，可以从获取位置的市政地址 。A civic address for a location can be obtained from a by using a class that implements . 如果 location 源同时提供坐标数据和市政地址数据，则类提供一个默认实现，该实现返回与对应的市政地址。The class provides a default implementation that returns the civic address that corresponds to a , if the location source provides both coordinate data as well as civic address data. 返回 当前位置的。 returns a for the current location. 如果 location 源无法将坐标位置解析为市政地址， 则返回。If the location source is unable to resolve the coordinate position to a civic address, is returned. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以同步方式 从 位置解析。The following example shows how to resolve a from a location synchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何以异步方式 从 位置解析。The following example shows how to resolve a from a location asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddressasync/cs/resolvecivicaddressasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddressasync/vb/resolvecivicaddressasync.vb#1)]
